member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:DistributionWebApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:DistributionWebApi.Controllers.ProductMappingController
member.summary: Used to retrieve TLGX Mapping data for specific Product Types. Each service has a FULL and a LITE version. The FULL Version includes the ability to send Supplier-specific geographic information. This FULL service can be used should the LITE service not retrieve a mapping result. TLGX Supplier Codes should always be used when making a request.

member.name: F:DistributionWebApi.Controllers.ProductMappingController._database
member.summary: Mongo database handler

member.name: M:DistributionWebApi.Controllers.ProductMappingController.GetBulkProductMapping(System.Collections.Generic.List{DistributionWebApi.Models.ProductMapping_RQ})
member.summary: Retrieves TLGX Hotel Property Code for Supplier Code(s), Supplier Hotel Code (s) and Geographical information. API can handle single / multiple supplier and single / multiple property requests at a time.
member.returns: Original Mapping request with TLGX Hotel Code and Mapped Status result. If there are no mapping record exists, MapId will be returned as Zero.

member.name: M:DistributionWebApi.Controllers.ProductMappingController.GetBulkProductMappingLite(System.Collections.Generic.List{DistributionWebApi.Models.ProductMappingLite_RQ})
member.summary: Retrieves TLGX Hotel Property Code for Supplier Code(s), Supplier Hotel Code (s) only. API can handle single / multiple supplier and single / multiple property requests at a time.
member.returns: Original Mapping request with TLGX Hotel Code and Mapped Status result. If there are no mapping record exists, MapId will be returned as Zero.

member.name: T:DistributionWebApi.Controllers.SupplierMasterController
member.summary: Used to retrieve Master Supplier Data for use in conjunction with all mapping services. TLGX Supplier Codes should always be used when making a mapping request.

member.name: F:DistributionWebApi.Controllers.SupplierMasterController._database
member.summary: Mongo database handler

member.name: M:DistributionWebApi.Controllers.SupplierMasterController.GetAllSupplier

member.returns: TLGX Supplier List

member.param: TLGX Supplier Code. This can be retrieved using Supplier Master Service.
member.returns: List of Supplier

member.name: M:DistributionWebApi.Controllers.SupplierMasterController.GetSupplierByName(System.String)
member.summary: Get all system suppliers by supplier name (Filtered using StartsWith)
member.param: TLGX Supplier Name. This can be retrieved using Supplier Master Service.
member.returns: List of Supplier
